san-lo-mvu55:7: atha bodhisatvaṁ dāni uruvilvāyāṁ tapovane nadyā nairaṁjanāyās tīre duṣkaracārikāṁ carantaṁ māro pāpīyāṁ upasaṁkramya vadayati || kiṁ prahāṇena kariṣyasi agāramadhye vasa | rājā bhaviṣyasi cakravarti | mahāyajñāni ca yajāhi aśvamedhaṁ puruṣamedhaṁ somaprāsaṁ nirargaḍaṁ padumaṁ puṇḍarīkaṁ ca | etāni yajñāni yajitvā pretya svargeṣu modiṣyasi bahu ca puṇyaṁ prasaviṣyasi | prahāṇaṁ ca duṣkaraṁ durabhisaṁbhaṇaṁ anavadyapuṇyapārihāṇi  brahmacaryavāsaṁ || bodhisatvo āha || nāhaṁ pāpīmaṁ puṇyehi arthiko |
san-lo-mvu55:13: kṛśo tvam asi durvarṇo santike maraṇaṁ tava |
san-lo-mvu55:14: saṁhara mahāprahāṇaṁ na āśā tuhya jīvite ||
san-lo-mvu55:15: jīvitaṁ te hitaṁ śreṣṭhaṁ jīvan puṇyāni kāhisi |
san-lo-mvu55:16: karohi puṇyāni tāni yena pretya na śocasi ||
san-lo-mvu55:18: anantaṁ jāyate puṇyaṁ kiṁ prahāṇena kāhisi ||
san-lo-mvu55:20: imāṁ vācāṁ bhaṇe māro bodhisatvasya santike ||
san-lo-mvu55:21: taṁ tathā idāniṁ māraṁ bodhisatvo dhyabhāṣata |
san-lo-mvu55:23: aṇumātraiḥ puṇyaiḥ artho mahyaṁ māra na vidyati |
san-lo-mvu55:24: yeṣāṁ tu artho puṇyehi kathaṁ tāṁ māra na vidyasi ||
san-lo-mvu55:25: nāhaṁ amaro ti manyāmi maraṇāntaṁ hi jīvitaṁ |
san-lo-mvu55:27: nadīnām api śrotāṁsi ayaṁ vāto va śoṣayet* |
san-lo-mvu55:29: śarīraṁ upaśuṣyati pittaṁ śleṣmaṁ ca vātajaṁ |
san-lo-mvu55:32: bhūyo smṛti ca vīryaṁ ca samādhi cāvatiṣṭhati ||
san-lo-mvu55:33: tasya caivaṁ viharato prāptasya uttamaṁ padaṁ |
san-lo-mvu55:34: nāyam atra kṣataṁ kāyaṁ paśya satvasya śuddhatāṁ ||
san-lo-mvu55:35: asti cchando ca vīryaṁ ca prajñā ca mama vidyati |
san-lo-mvu55:36: nāhaṁ taṁ paśyāmi loke yo prahāṇāto vāraye ||
san-lo-mvu55:38: eṣo sajjo prāṇaharo dhiggrāmyaṁ no ca jīvitaṁ ||
san-lo-mvu55:41: eṣo haṁ ca paraṁ cittaṁ bhāvayitvāna yodhane |
san-lo-mvu55:43: ahaṁ bodhitaror adhastāt* aprāpte amṛte pade |
san-lo-mvu55:46: tām ahaṁ nivartiṣyāmi senāṁ te anupūrvasaḥ ||
san-lo-mvu55:47: kāmā te prathamā senā dvitīyā ārati vuccati |
san-lo-mvu55:48: tṛtīyā kṣutpipāsā ca caturthī tṛṣṇā vuccati ||
san-lo-mvu55:49: paṁcamā styānamiddhaṁ te ṣaṣṭhī bhīru pravuccati |
san-lo-mvu55:50: saptamā vicikitsā te mānārtho bhoti aṣṭamā |
san-lo-mvu55:51: lobho ti śloko satkāro mithyālabdho ca yo yaśo ||
san-lo-mvu55:54: na tām aśūro jayati jitvā vā anuśocati |
san-lo-mvu55:55: tāṁ prajñāya te bhetsyāmi āmapātraṁ va ambunā ||
san-lo-mvu55:56: vaśīkaritvāna te śalyaṁ kṛtvā sūpasthitāṁ smṛtaṁ |
san-lo-mvu55:57: ālabdhavīryo viharanto vineṣyaṁ śrāvakāṁ pi tu ||
san-lo-mvu55:59: gaṁsāmi te akāmasya yatra duḥkhaṁ nirudhyati ||
